Gaseous Form Information

Description: Transform yourself or an ally into a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage. The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength Saving Throws. While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk.
